:::config { "language": "yaml" }
# torchlight! {"highlightLines": ["1-2", 4]}
jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    strategy:
      matrix:
        laravel: [ 7.*, 8.* ]
        dependency-version: [ prefer-lowest, prefer-stable ]
:::style
<style>
    .torchlight {
        padding: 10px;
    }

    .line-number, .summary-caret {
        margin-right: 10px;
    }
</style>
:::expectation
